DebitMemoAddress.name: DebitMemoAddress
DebitMemoAddress.description: Represents the buyer's address information, which is used to determine the tax amount for a buyer when a debit memo is issued.

Address.description: The billing or shipping address of the debit memo.

DebitMemoAddressNumber.description: The auto-generated reference number for the debit memo address.

DebitMemoId.description: The ID of the debit memo associated with the address.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed a debit memo address record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed a debit memo address record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that the user only accessed the debit memo address record or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the debit memo address record itself.
